html: Really proud of the @greenbankhs students who are competing in the regional finals of the UK Aerospace Youth Rocketry challenge today. They have to build a rocket, have it reach the highest possible altitude, and bring their crew (two eggs) safely back to Earth. Good luck!
text:
Really proud of the @greenbankhs students who are competing in the regional finals of the UK Aerospace Youth Rocketry challenge today. 

They have to build a rocket, have it reach the highest possible altitude, and bring their crew (two eggs) safely back to Earth. 

Good luck!
